original: 30 minutes before the Ianus twins found the body, Bellwether walked past Jan in the west wing hallway. He was in her path, so she shoved him out of her way. After that, she knocked over a vase and shattered it. Even though, Jan didn’t say anything to her, she yelled at him to “Be quiet!”. After this interaction, she walked into Lecture Hall 2-B. \n \nThe “Bellwether” witnessed by Jan Hughes must have been disguised with an illusion. In addition to that, whoever he saw that day was physically there.
translation: 伊努斯双子发现尸体半小时前，贝尔维瑟在走廊西翼与简擦肩而过。贝尔维瑟仿佛觉得简挡路，直接把他推开了。之后，凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟还打碎了一个花瓶。简虽然什么都没说，但还是被骂“安静！”。之后贝尔维瑟进了2-B讲堂。 简·休斯看到的“凯瑟琳·贝尔维瑟”是幻术。此外，他看见的那个人当时肯定亲身在场。
